content.heading: String Length
paragraphs: To get the length of a string, use the length() function:

Tip: You might see some C++ programs that use the size() function to get the length of a string. This is 
just an alias of length(). It is completely up to you if you want to use length() or size():

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
string txt = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" ;
cout << "The length of the txt string is: " << txt.length() ;

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
string txt = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ" ;
cout << "The length of the txt string is: " << txt.size() ;
